<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.

Thanks! I am still somewhat skeptical about adding a lock annotation then working around it, but all in all I think the annotation has value because it still allows checking the other uses of the lock. It's also good to document the hairy situation with a comment.\n\nutACK eea02be70ee37b845f2719b3c08e5baf4b6f51f6

Adding the to-be-fixed data race for future reference:
